name: Father and Sins
description:
In the hushed atmosphere of your church, the curtain opens on the worst sins of your flock.
Listen to tongues loosening and hearts unlocking.

Express your most sincere sympathy by absolving the lost sheep or condemn them with all your authority if they have crossed the line, all this in the austere intimacy of your church's confessional.
But beware, overstep the limits imposed by your superiors or irritate your parishioners and you are done. Sometimes difficult conclusions are necessary!

For the first time on your screen: Father and Sins, confessional simulator.
